name: A Strange Kind of Wizard
description:
"A Strange Kind of Wizard" is my entry for Insanity Jam 5, and was made to the theme: A game where you handle the most interesting wand, no matter what anyone thinks.

So far this is a very early version, with maybe 10-15 minutes of very simple gameplay. I intend to put a bit more work into it so that it includes interesting in-world puzzles, and a more fleshed out story.

Arrow Keys/WASD to move, Enter/Space to interact
